// Version 1.0, January 2007

1. copy the following files from ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/X.Y.Z/ucd to this directory
	CaseFolding.txt
	SpecialCasing.txt
	UnicodeData.txt
	DerivedNormalizationProps.txt
	PropList.txt
2. Set the current directory to this directory
3. Execute make_jclunicode.bat
